Name: CSR White Cloud
Details: A Sovetskii Soyuz-class heavy cruiser, the White Cloud was laid down by the Star League Navy as the SLS White Cloud. In 2736, it won the prestigous title of Best WarShip during that year's Martial Olympiad. It served during the Amaris Civil War and participated in Operation LIBERATION, the liberation of Terra from the Usurper's forces. The White Cloud eventually would accompany General Kerensky on the Exodus from the Inner Sphere and would find a home in the touman of Clan Snow Raven as part of their Swift Wing Naval Assault Star.
